epd_metadata.product_name: ASHBY’S READY MIXED - 30MPA ECOPACT STRUCTURAL MIX

product_description.description: Ready-mix concrete is produced at batching plants where controlled operations allow precise mix designs resulting in a product that is delivered to construction sites in a freshly mixed, plastic, or unhardened state.
product_description.substances_of_concern: The product does not contain one or more substances that are listed in the Candidate List of Substances of Very High Concern for Authorisation.

raw_materials: Secondary Materials (fly ash, silica fume, GGBFS)
manufacturing_process_flow.packaging: Holcim ready-mix concrete is delivered in bulk with no packaging.

recycled_materials.recycled_materials_used: There is no recycled materials used in producing the product.

impact_categories_calculated_manually: Use of renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PERM)
Use of non-renewable primary energy resources used as raw materials (PENRM)

data_quality.foreground_data_source: Primary source by Holcim (NZ) for January 2022 - December 2022

included_modules: A1 - Extraction and production of primary raw materials
system_boundaries.notes: Emissions from construction installation (A5) excluded due to no operational control; distribution (A4) and use stages (B1-B7) excluded.

principles: Initial allocation divides system sub-processes and collects input/output data.
First allocation step partitions inputs/outputs based on physical relationships.
Second allocation step (worst case) uses economic value if physical relationships cannot be established.
allocation.application: Allocation based on annual production volume by physical relationships; fuel consumption for mixing/loading measured per declared unit without allocation.

cut_off_rules.description: Minimum 95% of total inflows (mass and energy) per module included; minimum 99% of renewable and non-renewable primary energy use included; packaging excluded except for raw material packaging which is excluded entirely.
exclusions: Environmental impact from infrastructure, construction, production equipment, and tools not directly consumed.

lca_information.comparability: EPDs within the same product category but from different programmes or not compliant with EN 15804 may not be comparable.

transport.raw_material_transport: All materials transported via truck; aggregates and cements by heavy trucks; other raw materials by medium trucks.
transport.deconstruction: Deconstruction assumed to use drilling to break and remove concrete.
transport.waste_collection_distance: 50 km from construction site to landfill.
transport.end_of_life_transport: 50 km assumed distance to landfill based on major city landfill sites.

installation.notes: Emissions from construction installation (A5) excluded as Holcim (NZ) does not have operational control.

end_of_life.deconstruction: Assumed to use drilling to break and remove concrete.
end_of_life.waste_processing: No recycling assumed; C3 impact is zero.
end_of_life.disposal: All products assumed to be landfilled (C4).
end_of_life.carbonation: No carbonation at end of life.
end_of_life.recycling: No recycling for the product at end of life.

carbon_emission_context.carbonation: No CO2 uptake has taken place in any module declared.

recycled_materials_handling.allocation_method: Impacts for co-products allocated according to PCR 2019:14 Construction Products and Construction Services (co-produced goods, multi-output allocation).
recycled_materials_handling.recycled_materials_used: No recycled materials used in producing the product.

key_assumptions.raw_material_packaging: Excluded for simplicity and lack of comprehensive data.
key_assumptions.emission_factors: Most assigned emission factors for raw materials are generic from LCA databases; supplier-specific EPDs incorporated where available.
key_assumptions.transport_distances: Known distances used where available; others estimated as average for material type.
key_assumptions.GreenStar_and_IS_indicators: Included for future reporting; transport impacts for Holcim cement product do not include these indicators.
key_assumptions.waste_production: Estimated by Holcim (NZ); more specific data could improve accuracy.
key_assumptions.transport_to_landfill: Assumed 50 km based on typical distances in major cities.

data_quality_assessment.raw_materials: Primary source data from Holcim (NZ) 2022, very good quality.
data_quality_assessment.disposal: Based on national GHG report, fair quality.
